definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: What I he left? In writing this confession.
sentences.chinese: 我還能剩什麼？在書寫這悔過書。

definition: to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
(idiom) to lose one's head/to panic/to go to pieces
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness
to agree on three laws (idiom)/three-point covenant/(fig.) preliminary agreement/basic rules
old: to reap the consequences of one's words (idiom, from Mencius); modern: to go back on one's word/to blow hot and cold/to contradict oneself/inconsistent
